price: Siku hiyo nyuso nyengine zitakuwa kunjufu.
footnotes: Na pia zitakuwapo nyuso zenye kutoa nuru Siku ya Kiyama, kwa malipo ya vitendo vyao walivyo fanya duniani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
